Headline: Northbound #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Reroute near Narragansett/Belmont
ShortDescription: Northbound 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are rerouted via Narragansett, Diversey, Austin, and Belmont due to a street blockage near Narragansett/Belmont

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Narragansett, Diversey, Austin, Belmont, Narragansett and resume normal route, due to a street blockage near Narragansett/Belmont.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
